page.title: 03SOCIAL CLUBS & SPORTS
page.content:
{which no-one takes part is motor racing. The football ground at Fulham drew more people to watch than any other venue. A small number also watched local football teams.
CINEMA
The least popular family pastime, with only 6 visits in a month, and 4 of these were by one family.
SWIMMING
Two thirds of the families surveyed go swimming regularly. One third go as a family weekly, one third monthly and the remainder "regularly". Kingston, Leatherhead and Epsom are the favourite swimming pools. All families have to travel out of Ewell
